title: Codimensions of identities of solvable Lie superalgebras
authors: M. V. Zaicev, D. D. Repov\v{s}
abstract:
We study identities of Lie superalgebras over a field of characteristic zero.
We construct a series of examples of finite-dimensional solvable Lie
superalgebras with a non-nilpotent commutator subalgebra for which PI-exponent
of codimension growth exists and is an integer number.
